thread.title: Conway WR Edwards, Spartanburg RB Feaster up for award
thread.title_full: Conway WR Edwards, Spartanburg RB Feaster up for award

title: Conway WR Edwards, Spartanburg RB Feaster up for award
text:
Conway WR Edwards, Spartanburg RB Feaster up for award Tools 
Story Created: Oct 15, 2015 at 4:00   16, 2015 at 9:00 PM EDT 
MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. (AP) â€” South Carolina football commitment receiver Bryan Edwards of Conway and Clemson commitment running back Tavien Feaster of Spartanburg are two of the five finalists for the Palmetto State's Mr. Football awards. 
The other finalists are Chapin quarterback Logan Bailey, Dorman quarterback Collin Hill and Fort Dorchester offensive lineman John Simpson. 
The award will be presented Dec. 4 at the Palmetto Champions Banquet in advance of the Touchstone Energy Bowl North-South Game that features many of the top senior football players in South Carolina.
